a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Average performance of 15 year olds on the mathematics scale girls vs. boys,
Assessed through the PISA mathematics scale, which is based on an OECD country mean of 500 points and a standard
PISA: Average mathematics score for boys
PISA: Average mathematics score for girls
Data source: OECD via World Bank (2023)
